data.title: Chief Operating Officer, International Ornella Barra salary at WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE INC
data.meta_description: Salary, bonuses, stock options and other compensation for Ornella Barra, Chief Operating Officer, International at WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE INC. How much did Ornella Barra make in 2023
data.text:
Employers Seeking efficiency in executive compensation benchmarking?

Unlock Efficiency in Executive Compensation Benchmarking with CompAnalyst Executive

CompAnalyst Executive

As Chief Operating Officer, International at WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE INC, Ornella Barra made $5,434,288 in total compensation. Of this total $992,099 was received as a salary, $0 was received as a bonus, $0 was received in stock options, $3,989,920 was awarded as stock and $452,269 came from other types of compensation. This information is according to proxy statements filed for the 2023 fiscal year.
